Project Description

Reflection Studio is a development tool that encapsulate all my work around reflection, performance and WPF. It allows to inject performance traces into any NET software, get them back for analyse and reporting. Reflection Studio is a complete new re-write of my unfinished/deleted project NPerf.

Background

On my last project, I experienced that there was no software to test performance on mobiles for NET applications. The ones working on Winform or ASP.NET site have a high performance cost because they hook everything they need. So, I start this one having with a view to including in it all my work around reflection like assembly diagrams and code generation.

Work in progress, Talented contributors wanted !

If you feel interrested, please let me know at guillaume DOT waser AT free DOT fr

Quick overview

  • Performance injection module
  • Assembly explorer and class diagram
  • Database explorer, schema plugin and query editor, automatique scripting, Quality audit, Diagrams(?)
  • Template explorer, code editor, code generation (later)
